turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi. I'd like to order a coffee for pick-up, please.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: for Peet's Coffee in Huntington Beach, California.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like a a large Golden Caffè Latte made with soy milk, and I'd like that over ice, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: one moment while i order that for you'

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so i have ordered you a large iced golden caffe latte with soy milk to be picked up at huntington beach pete's coffee, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your receipt will be texted to you and it will be ready for pickup in 10 minutes.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Perfect. Thank you so much. No, that's it.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?
